column5: Does anyone know the regulations or where to find the regs. regarding transporting minnows and/or leachs into Canada for fishing. I know the regs. on crawlers but not other baits. Thanks!
It is illegal to transport live leeches or minnows into Canada.
You cannot transport any live bait other than Nightcrawlers, and they cannot be in dirt. Frozen minnows are Ok.
